tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE rewards_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    points INT DEFAULT 0,
    goals_met BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
)

CREATE TABLE NutritiousOptions (
    option_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    option_name VARCHAR,
    is_nutritious BOOLEAN,
    calories INT,
    protein_grams INT
);

CREATE TABLE goals (
    goal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    target_calories INT NOT NULL,
    target_protein INT NOT NULL,
    target_carbs INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE food_log (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    meal_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    calories INT NOT NULL,
    protein INT NOT NULL,
    carbs INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
 user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 age INT,
 has_consistently_chosen_nutritious_options BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE goals (
 goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
 target_calories INT NOT NULL,
 target_protein INT NOT NULL,
 target_fiber INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE meal_options (
 meal_option_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 option_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 calories INT NOT NULL,
 protein INT NOT NULL,
 fiber INT NOT NULL
);
